insert into pq_user_feedback_img (feedback_id, img, state, created_time, updated_time) values (#{feedbackId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update pq_user_feedback_img set feedback_id = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, feedback_id, img, state, created_time, updated_time from pq_user_feedback_img
